forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 33F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late in the day. Thunder possible. High 4C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 41F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming clear later. Low -4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming clear later. Low 26F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 67F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
